rougelikeLibrary

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • rougelikeLibrary.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Main container for a room in the grid that makes up the game world

      • play

        public Position.CardinalDirection play()
        Plays this room. Each play starts with the player if it exist. If player activates a door this method exists. If player doesn't activate a door the the rest of the characters in the room is played. If character doesn't activate a door null is returned.
        Returns:
        if player activates a door the new direction for next room to enter. if no door is activated null is returned.

        Parameters:

      • moveCharacter

        public void moveCharacter(Position fromPosition,
                          Position toPosition)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Move character from one position to an other. If there is no character in from position method returns.
        Parameters:
        fromPosition -
        toPosition -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessError - if there's already a character in to position or from and to position is same. There can only be one character per position.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:

      • getCardinalDirection

        public Position.CardinalDirection getCardinalDirection(Position position)
                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Translates a position at the borders of a room into the corresponding cardinal direction.
        Parameters:
        position - the position at the borders of a room.
        Returns:
        a cardinal direction that corresponds to the position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - of there is no valid translation from position to cardinal direction or if position is null.
